sources.title: Mama Dracula (1980)
sources.description: A female vampire must bathe in the blood of virgins in order to stay alive. The trouble is that virgins are in short supply nowadays, and she is running into major problems in finding one. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/mama-dracula-1980/

sources.title: Mama Dracula
sources.description: A female vampire (Louise Fletcher) needs to bathe in the blood of virgins in order to stay alive, but they are in short supply.

metadata.Plot: A female vampire must bathe in the blood of virgins in order to stay alive. The trouble is that virgins are in short supply nowadays, and she is running into major problems in finding one.
metadata.Writer: Tony Hendra, Pierre Sterckx, Boris Szulzinger
metadata.Actors: Louise Fletcher, Maria Schneider, Marc-Henri Wajnberg
